mapper.select: SELECT friendview.userID, friendview.friendID, friendview.unreadMsgCount, `user`.username AS friendName, `user`.userAvatar AS friendAvatar, `session`.recentMsg, `session`.recentMsgTimeStamp FROM friendview LEFT JOIN `user` ON friendview.friendID = `user`.userID LEFT JOIN `session` ON friendview.sessionID = `session`.sessionID WHERE friendview.userID = #{userID}
SELECT * FROM message WHERE message.sessionID IN (SELECT friendview.sessionID FROM friendview WHERE friendview.userID = #{userID} AND friendview.friendID = #{friendID})
